Ski BASE
programme.desc: Tag along as Erik Roner walks us through his epic Cody Peak Ski BASE in Jackson Hole, Wyoming and then heads to Juneau, Alaska on a quest for even more ski BASE lines.

programme.title: Mountain In The Hallway
programme.desc: When Tate MacDowell and Brian McDonnell were diagnosed with cancer in 2016, they faced some tough realities. Nevertheless, they set their sights high: to beat cancer and climb the Grand Teton.

programme.title: Kayak Fishing Lake Erie
programme.desc: Fishing and kayaking is an unbeatable combination, as it allows you to fish in places inaccessible by boat or foot. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he meets up with Baer Fishing Adventures to chase pike and bass from their kayaks in the marshes surrounding Long Point Bay in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County.

programme.title: Turtle Ranch
programme.desc: Join TGR and Anthill Films as they turn Turtle Ranch into a bike park with the world's most advanced jumps and features and try to ride a ridge with a herd of thirty horses while filming for unReal, TGR's 2015 bike film.

programme.title: Immersion
programme.desc: Surfing is an amazing, enjoyable and incredible experience for everyone. But it is so much more than just a fun day at the beach for these kids. For three days in the summer in Maine, children with developmental disabilities, their families and their communities get together. It is here that bonds are made, and physical and mental change happens for all involved. The explosive joy has long lasting effects across all who attend.

programme.title: Re:Session
programme.desc: Learn more about some of the most iconic lines in Teton Gravity Research's 2009 film "Re:Session", featuring some of the world's most talented skiers and snowboarders pushing the limits of their sport.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the 1000 Islands
programme.desc: The crystal-clear waters of Lake Ontario are home to a spectacular group of islands known as the 1000 Islands – and there’s 1000 good reasons to visit. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores the must-see local paddling spots by sea kayak.

programme.title: The Joe Louis Story
programme.desc: The true story of heavyweight champion Joe Lewis featuring real footage highlights of important fights. This film includes many side stories showing Joe's personal interactions and relationships as well as detailing Joe's heroic influence in American life and civil rights beyond his boxing accomplishments.

programme.title: F4 Championship: Saudi Arabia
programme.desc: The 2024 Formula 4 Saudi Arabian Championship is the first season of the championship. The championship is a 6-event, 24-race series that will visit Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, and Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship
programme.desc: The 2024 Mondokart.com FIA Karting European Championship takes place in Great Britain

programme.title: FIA Rally Cup
programme.desc: A high-level rally category for four-wheel-drive Rally cars competing on mixed surfaces.

programme.title: The 900 Series
programme.desc: Blake replaces the sway bar on a 911 for track performance; Brant troubleshoots a 928 that won't start on hot days; Tony illustrates the engine test stand

programme.title: Sams Garage
programme.desc: The Lokar Jeep gets new control arms and brackets while the T-bird gets a front accessory kit. A new Livernois cam on a Challenger and Sams Supra gets a new 6 speed American Powertrain transmission.

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Chris takes the Triumph Tiger 900 Rally Pro to some of his favourite roads and trials to find out if their claim is true.

programme.title: Saudi Baja Hail Rally

programme.title: Garden Party
programme.desc: Ready to dig in and grow your green thumb? Join us for a delightful hour of expert-led gardening tutorials designed to inspire and educate gardeners of all levels. From essential planting tips and soil secrets to creative container gardening and vibrant floral arrangements, our seasoned instructors will guide you through every step. Whether you're a seasoned horticulturist or just starting out, you'll find fresh ideas and practical techniques to cultivate the garden of your dreams.

programme.title: People
programme.desc: People come in all shapes and sizes. The first project uses papier mache and garden gloves to create cowboy and girl puppets. Next, decorate your own flip flops. Draw faces in your art journal without even lifting your pencil off the page. And finally, create clothespin action figures of all kinds from ninjas -- to fairies.

programme.desc: In Noodle and Bun Episode 4, "Finding the Squishy Thief!," Noodle’s favorite squishy toy goes missing. He teams up with Bun to investigate, leading to a funny twist and a lesson in teamwork and problem-solving.

programme.title: Appointment on Mars
programme.desc: Three astronauts land on Mars, hoping to find valuable minerals. After discovering a rich deposit of uranium ore, one of the men becomes increasingly paranoid. Is it just his imagination, or are they really being watched?

programme.title: The Mad Doctor (1933)
programme.desc: Mickey must save Pluto from a mad doctor's lair.

programme.title: The Haunted Ship (1930)
programme.desc: Waffles and Don explore a sunken ship where they meet drunk turtles singing "Sweet Adeline" and a skeletal Davy Jones.

programme.title: The Dead Don't Steal
programme.desc: Married Ken Johnson runs a charter plane service with his lover and air stewardess Lilian, who indulges in a little smuggling on his behalf. Then disaster strikes for him, as his wife discovers the affair and Lilian says she is leaving him for another man and the smuggling will end. In a rage he kills her and disposes of the body. But to his astonishment she appears to come back from the dead and ensures that justice catches up with him.

programme.title: ANY MINUTE NOW
programme.desc: When her parents decide to separate, sixteen year old Anna Brooks is sent to spend the summer in a small coastal town with her old fashioned aunt and uncle, Jennifer and David Collingwood. Anna is narcoleptic and suffers traumatic hallucinations as side effects to her medication. Whilst living in small town suburbia several bizarre incidents take place which lead Anna to question her own sanity. Is it really all in her head or is something more sinister going on in the small sleepy town?

programme.title: PENANCE
programme.desc: A young mother decides to become a stripper to earn some fast cash only to find her worst nightmares are about to begin when she falls into the hands of a religious fanatic intent on changing her evil ways.

programme.title: DO IT IN POST
programme.desc: Comedy about the horrors of shooting a low budget feature in modern day Miami and everything that that can possible go wrong on set. The story is told through the eyes of Alex Gonzalez, a pothead who is kidnapped by his best friend Chris during a minor drug transaction and forced to be a PA on the set of an ultra low budget movie. Alex has no idea what a PA does or what it takes to make a movie but he has common sense, which is lacking heavily on this set. Chris promises Alex that hell drive him home as soon as they get the first shot completed; but for this feature, getting anything in the can is a major task.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 27
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: MeetZoonicornValeo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Breaking Chai
programme.desc: A holy man with quite a fan following claiming to possess magical telepathic powers turns up outside the shop. Chai Raja is more than accommodating- after all its extra business right at the doorstep and Basha is curious as the flexible Baba flaunts some acrobatic twists that Basha finds interesting. Sundar, on the other hand is too lazy and not enthusiastic about the extra crowd. The Baba is pompous and demanding- he bosses Chai Raja about . Chai Raja sees the crowding eager fans and the extra money and accommodates the demands. But Sundar is irritated by the Babas attitude and would love to get rid of him. Basha on the flipside is won over by the Baba who magically pulls out special bananas for Basha- Basha instantly teams up with the Baba. Sundar annoyed further at this partnership clumsily intervenes and instead he ends up exposing the Baba who was actually an imposter all along. Though the show is ruined, Chai Raja still grins as his shop has suddenly gone all popular and people are streaming in to see the dog that dunnit and Sundar for once, though still a server, beams as he dishes out paw-shaped fritters- his way of giving an autograph.

programme.title: COWBUAAY CHAI
programme.desc: There is a harvest festival and Chai Raja expects extra business. Sundar is awed by the grand floats and dressed up cattle but what seems to be the star attraction is a cattle wrangler who dressed in fancy gear shows off his talent at lassoing. Sundar manages to cajole a lasso out of the performer but is pathetic he just ends up breaking stuff around the shop. An irate Chai Raja snatches the lasso and chucks it away warning Sundar to keep away from it. But the naughty Basha having overheard the exchange snatches up the discarded lasso. He tries a few flicks and thanks to his circus bent of character is able to master it. The thrilled Basha now sets about framing poor Sundar- he wrecks, snatches away fries and disrupts work about the shop with the lasso and Chai Raja believes its Sundar who does it. Sundar must now quickly rein the situation before he gets the proverbial boot.

programme.title: BITTEN BY BUG
programme.desc: Buzz falls head over heels for a mysterious, secret admirer who just moved into the library. Suspicious of her true motives, Googly and Iris try to warn Buzz that he knows nothing about his new friend and that she may not be as nice as she seems, but he ignores their advice. After agreeing to meet his new friend for lunch, Buzz learns the hard way that love can really hurt - literally. Watch the brand new, full episode here and find out how Buzz got a boo boo, and why he needed an emergency ride in an ambulance to see the doctor, in another exciting adventure of Creepy Candy

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: TEA-THING TRAUMA
programme.desc: Chai Rajas old aunt, a lady who is pencil thin and frail as a willow turns up for a visit. Sundar believes she is a sweet toothless granny, the wallpaper kind- but what he or Basha for that matter dont anticipate is the granny to have a voracious appetite. The granny gobbles up just about anything in sight and the trays barely make it out of the kitchen to the customers. Sundar almost catches her red-handed and when questioned by Chai Raja for the missing snacks blames her- in return he gets a sound thwack on his head as a furious Chai Raja points at his granny who beams wide- she is toothless! How can she eat without teeth! Demands Chai Raja. Sundar too is perplexed and so is Basha who too is annoyed to find his normal share of fritters missing. Basha and he team up to corner the artful granny. They soon discover that she has a hidden pair of dentures that she uses conveniently to chew down the chow. With Bashas help, Sundar manages to snatch away the dentures and the shop erupts in chaos as the granny proves that she too has quite a killer aim with plates! She retrieves the dentures and is about to chomp down in triumph when Chai Raja happens on her. But all the sweet-natured Chai Raja does is pack some extra fritters for her as she bids him a goodbye while an exasperated Sundar chases Basha from again raiding the shelves.

programme.title: Mysterious stranger_1
programme.desc: The stranger walks thru the old library, snapping pictures and making notes all the while mumbling incoherently under his breath, when He stops and rings a bell.he Creepy Candy decide to have the Hooligan J. Beans follow Mr. Dark into the bathroom. They hide and watch. as he goes to the sink and removes his glasses and looks in the mirror.

programme.title: The Violinist
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old violin and, on discovering that he’s a distant descendant famous musician of “Gummy Stradi-bear-ius”, he starts playing the violin non-stop... driving everyone around him completely nuts.

programme.title: Super Fun Color Run
programme.desc: Sneevil tries to sabotage the Smighties annual Colour Festival by cementing the competing Smighties with his newest contraption. The Super Six must get colorfully creative to stop him.

programme.title: MEOW HELP YOU?
programme.desc: It is not a good morning for Sundar as he is messing up the orders. Then a very sophisticated apron clad thin wiry man comes to the shop. Within seconds, he convinces Chai Raja of his efficiency and skill both in and around the kitchen and is instantly employed. Chai Raja is super impressed and the next moment, Sundar is kicked out of the shop. Sundar tears his hair- he has to get rid of the man- but the man despite his suave look is extremely streetwise and fights dirty. Basha meanwhile too finds the man too cunning for his liking when he gets whacked a few times and agrees to team up with Sundar to put him out of commission. Together they manage to reveal the mans actual nature to Chai Raja and the customers and gets him ousted. As for their alliance, that goes out the window the second Sundar is presented back with his towel- the mark of his employment. The two chase and the chai pours as routine.

programme.title: TRAPPED
programme.desc: Sundar is chucking the peels and rubbish (after a mild run-in with Basha) into a compost pit when he notices a queer little sapling with a lovely bud like flower. When Sundar tickles the bud, the plant twitches as if responding to the touch. Intrigued, Sundar scoops up the sapling to a coconut shell and brings it to the hotel but is quickly divested off it as Chai Raja ushers him to clean up before turning in. Chai Raja sloshes his special night brew and some spills onto the plant. The plant shudders unnoticed by anyone, the brew boosting its growth so quickly...that by morning when Sundar wakes up he shrieks to find a massive venus fly trap in place of the small fragile sapling he had left the night before. Chai Raja though does freak out in the beginning does let Sundar keep the huge plant pet once he sees its adeptness at keeping the tables clean off flies, especially when rewarded with sips of tea! Basha finding the plant extremely quirky pranks it with pepper seeds and thats it. The plant now breathing fire chases after Basha himself. And Sundar is thrilled at first, but then things fly wrong as the plant starts wrecking the hotel. It is literally a war in the hotel and Sundar is at his wits end, so is Chai Raja. But Basha is having a good time, though the plant is impartial even towards Basha. Going into magic space.

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: Trash Planet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: BULL-DOZER
programme.desc: It is harvest festival and the backyard of Hotel Kelifornia is transformed into a muddy field.Basha and Sundar are the usual chasing self. The duo soon finds that it is bull racing competition happening in the backyard makeshift field. Basha in all his style is ready to participate. Chai Raja is very excited to see a buzzing crowd around his hotel which means good business. Sundar who get busy with serving and excited about the racing gets a jealous competitive streak when he sees Basha. Sundar sneaks out and is ready to race. The third participant is a lanky frail kid with two thinner bulls. The race is on. And Basha and Sundar soon gets into chasing each other messing each others racing and everything around them. It is a hilarious spectacle for the crowd and a horrifying experience for Chai Raja. And race ends with a thoroughly beaten Basha and Sundar losing to the lanky kid who still cant believe that he won since he and the skinny bulls just walked through the race. The story ends with Chai Raja putting both Sundar and Basha to clean up the whole mess they created.

programme.title: GONE WITH THE CHAI!
programme.desc: Its a very windy day and Sundar is having a tough time as Chai Raja sends him running in all directions- sometimes to throw more coconut fronds onto the rapidly diminishing roof, at other times to keep an especially thin customer from flying off! Basha only adds to his woes as Basha deliberately keeps undoing all that Sundar does just so that the poor waiter of Hotel California stays distracted enough and cant chase the bothersome Basha off the premises. Sundar tries tacking a tarpaulin sheet but Basha naughtily shifts it to the entrance where the tarpaulin sheet takes on a mind of its own and customers find themselves ushered/plonked into the shop in unorthodox manners. Sundar runs to take it down and is also caught up by the stormy tarpaulin sheet. Finally, Sundar has it stuffed into the closet but then he finds that the wind has weakened one of the wooden posts and the roof may fall any second on the tea-sippers. Sundar tries his own (bad) handyman skills and drill nails to hold up the post, but Bashas interference leads to the post crumbling entirely. Desperate, Sundar stands in place of the post, holding the roof up- Basha tickles & taunts Sundar and has a gala time. But the loyal Sundar sticks through it. Suddenly the storm seems to die and Sundar gingerly steps out of the spot- and quickly sticks in a pipe to hold up the roof it seems to be holding!! Relieved, he dashes to where Chai Raja has set out his supper and casually flicks a tiny baby coconut that had fallen in it aside...but this ricochets off the many already shaken up posts of the stall and in a trice the three posts of the stall are knocked down. The pipe creaks...then bends and as Sundar gulps, the last support of the roof too gives away and it comes crashing down! In the distance Basha chuckles and tucks in for the night.

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: Silly Smighty Day
programme.desc: Its Silly Smighty Day and Zap thinks hes just too serious of a Smighty to show his silly side. But all that changes when Sneevil and Biggs transform Smighties into helpless puppies. Now Zap has to put on the act of a lifetime and pretend to be a puppy to stop the Villains.

programme.title: BOLT-ADE
programme.desc: Peelville is plagued by a lightning-charged beverage that is the latest weapon in the arsenal of an intergalactic megalomaniac.

programme.title: APPLECART UPSET
programme.desc: The Fruit Ninjas, Mark Samurai, Durian grey and Sensei meet at DFS burger for a final showdown

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: BRUSH WITH DANGER
programme.desc: The Guardians can’t believe the Elders are giving them art lessons – HARD art lessons, with lots of criticism! But all the lessons in brushwork pay off when the Guardians apply their new skills to wielding their weapons as they battle a big color-blasting mutant snail sent by….you guessed it!

programme.title: Plastic Spoon
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko reuse spoons to make some cute DIYs

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: King ragoo
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a golden marker and they find themselves in a place where all the kids have to obey a kid king’s orders.

programme.title: Chill out!
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in the gaming world where an irascible frog is very angry: no wonder nobody ever wants to play with him, unless...

programme.title: Love Me Not
programme.desc: Don is sitting in the bathtub, smiling. He slips down further and gets comfy as he lies in the tub.He turns over and pulls the cushion around his neck closer. Only, it’s not a cushion. It’s an OCTOPUS!And its in love with Colonel!

programme.title: The Star Talers
programme.desc: In the cold winter, the kindhearted girl, GoGo, meets several people who feel sorry for her on her way home. A fairy queen appears in front of a GoGGo that distributes all her clothes and bread and shakes in the cold.

programme.title: Royal rift
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a banjo and they find themselves in a fantasy castle where a King and a Queen keep fighting about everything. The Twins will play a song that will bring peace in this land.

programme.title: Magic Magic
programme.desc: Cat has to find new ways of catching Keet so as he sees the snake charmer on the street he gets a idea and quietly snatches away the flute of the charmer and runs back to the house to hypnotize Cat with it.

programme.title: Baby Sitting
programme.desc: It’s the summer holidays. GrandPA’s daughter is visiting her dad from the neighboring town with her year old baby.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: Much ado about poo
programme.desc: YOYO visit a park for dogs that is ruined by pooches fouling on the grass which their owners cant be bothered to clear up

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Much to Your Surprise
programme.desc: When Maple ruins a surprise meant for Pancake, she finds out in the Zooniverse that surprises are only surprising when they are surprises. Seeing things from other people’s points of view can make things easier to understand.

programme.title: Scary Face
programme.desc: Pancake over-teases Maple with his new “scary face,” then gets a taste of his own medicine in the Zooniverse when, as the old saying goes, his face freezes that way. Just because you think something is fun or funny doesn’t mean everybody else is having the same good time you are.

programme.title: “Moo”-Ing Trouble!
programme.desc: Help! There is a cow in the bathroom this time, and he is on a mad eating spree, happily mooing away soap bubbles too!Don & Colonel try in vain to get rid of the cow but the three mice seem to have a different agenda. To make matters worse, a bull has made its grand entry into the scene too

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: Better Than You
programme.desc: Pancake must come to terms with not being better at something than his little sister Maple, which is mirrored in the Zooniverse when he tries to help the Zoonicorns build Jiggly Stone wall. Even when you’re not the best at something, you can always be helpful.

programme.title: THE TROJAN HEDGEHOG
programme.desc: The Guardians each come up with a gift for Maestra Saku’s birthday. A mysterious wooden hedgehog shows up as a gift, which proves to have Koto and Amkko inside! They attack the Magic Fort, but are thwarted by the Guardians when Xia bluffs about the dangers of his gift.

programme.title: Wink of an Eye
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Pineapple Rain
programme.desc: When Nardys pizza propagating machine goes awry, he tosses it out the window and into the hands of Biggs who turns it into an extreme weather making machine. Can Nardy and the other Smighties stop it in time?

programme.title: Baby Sitting
programme.desc: It’s the summer holidays. GrandPA’s daughter is visiting her dad from the neighboring town with her year old baby.

programme.title: Baghdad in Bloom
programme.desc: Aladdin buys magic seeds from the market with the food money believing the plant will bring him riches. However when it doesnt grow he and Jamillah enlist Genie to help, he does his thing and suddenly the plant grows! Everyone in town hears about the plant and comes to see it in Aladdins garden - hoping that they too will get blessed with riches. Even the Sultan comes to see its beauty. The crowd waits with bated breath but when it opens - it stinks like smelly cheese. The crowd disperse but the Sultan is transfixed by the rare scent. He sees the value and beauty in it where others dont and gives Aladdin gold in exchange for the plant.

programme.title: The Fallen Star
programme.desc: Maestra Saku teaches the Guardians how to connect with the constellations and make use of their powers. Pai is terrified of bats, but when a meteorite falls into the Shadowy Hollow, he has no choice but to connect with the bat constellation. As a result, he manages to beat the Rock-Eating Mutant and his phobia at the same time.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: Mouse Chase
programme.desc: A small mouse is very scared and just escaped from Hoodie and his gang to now hide in the house. Well from the pan into the fire as he realizes that Cat is worst then Hoodie.

programme.title: Friday Gets Recalled
programme.desc: Brains is informed that Friday is being recalled, and replaced by a superior shape-shifting robot weapon. Fred convinces Brains to help retrieve Friday from a futuristic junk yard, because Friday is also a friend. Meanwhile the new robot tries to hunt them down and stop them.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: Low Memory
programme.desc: Sneevil gets amnesia and the Smighties take him on a camping adventure. They have a great time with him until he gets his memory back!

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: The Fly-Away Nightingale
programme.desc: Whilst picking some fruit, Aladdin accidentally lets the Sultans precious nightingale go free. Genie is convinced that he can call him back using a spell but he cant remember where it is, so Jamillah and Aladdin run after it. They chase the bird to the market where he lands on a traders stall and Jamillah must outwit the trader using her modern phone to get him back. Finally Jamillah and Aladdin call Genie to use the magic carpet to retrieve it and Genie remembers the right spell just in time.

programme.title: The Great Conspiracy
programme.desc: All of Braianna’s enemies are brought together by the villainous Egghead. Brains is trying to get promoted, even though a higher title would mean she’d have to move away.

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: Like A Bridge Over Troubled Teeter Totters
programme.desc: Pancake helps the Zoonicorns “imagine” a bridge across the Sticky-Icky River, but it comes out completely wrong, and he must learn not to give up and that just because something ended up a bit different than planned that it still can’t do the job. Don’t give up if something doesn’t go exactly as planned; keep trying and be creative.

programme.title: An Unforgettable Journey - 3 Little Pigs Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the world of fairytales, having been called out by the THREE BEARS. They ask the detective to investigate a fraudulent lottery. They have bought loads of packets of detergent in the hope of winning a cruise, which was the prize in the lottery. But the prize has gone to the 7 LITTLE GOATS and the 3 PIGS, who had only bought one packet each. SANDRA and FO will very soon discover that the whole think is a trap laid by the WOLF to devour the LITTLE GOATS and the PIGS.

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: BUDDY SYSTEM
programme.desc: Xia rejects April’s advice on a fighting move, accepting the identical advice from Pai. Maestra Saku says today they’ll study using the Buddy System. Xia’s paired with Saku and has to knit while April and Pai learn much more exciting lessons in the forest. But the knitting lessons pay off when Xia uses his new skills to rescue April and Pai from a giant mutant spider. Xia learns females give excellent advice on fighting!

programme.title: 20 Days

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"
